title: How to Draw a Gingerbread House

steps.headline: Draw a square.
Draw a triangle on top.
Draw a rectangle next to the square.
Draw two straight lines that connect the triangle to the rectangle.
Draw a rectangle underneath.
Draw some circles around your Gingerbread house.
Draw some curved lines inside the circles to form spirals.
Draw horizontal and vertical lines through the roof.
Draw wavy lines on the roof and on the sides of the house.
Draw small cylinders with rounded ends in the roof's boxes.
Draw a disc-shaped object with wavy lines in the center of the house's roof.
Draw a rectangle underneath to begin the door.
Draw three thin rectangles around the door.
Draw stripes through the three rectangles.
Draw dots on the door.
Draw two squares on the side of the house to begin the windows.
Draw wavy plus-signs in the windows.
Draw wavy lines on the outside of the windows.
Draw gummy bears on top of the house.
Draw wavy lines under the door to begin the trail.
Draw small circles on the trail.
steps.description: These will be M&M's stepping stones.

steps.headline: Draw two candy canes beside the door.
Draw a giant lollipop behind the house.
Erase extra sketch lines.
Color.

text: Draw a square.  Draw a triangle on top.  Draw a rectangle next to the square.  Draw two straight lines that connect the triangle to the rectangle.  Draw a rectangle underneath.  Draw some circles around your Gingerbread house.  Draw some curved lines inside the circles to form spirals. These will be peppermints. Draw horizontal and vertical lines through the roof.  Draw wavy lines on the roof and on the sides of the house. This will be frosting. Draw small cylinders with rounded ends in the roof's boxes. These will be gumdrops. Draw a disc-shaped object with wavy lines in the center of the house's roof. This will be a donut. Draw a rectangle underneath to begin the door.  Draw three thin rectangles around the door.  Draw stripes through the three rectangles.  Draw dots on the door.  Draw two squares on the side of the house to begin the windows.  Draw wavy plus-signs in the windows.  Draw wavy lines on the outside of the windows.  Draw gummy bears on top of the house.  Draw wavy lines under the door to begin the trail.  Draw small circles on the trail. These will be M&M's stepping stones. Draw two candy canes beside the door.  Draw a giant lollipop behind the house.  Erase extra sketch lines.  Color.
